What is JAGZ?

JAGZ is a growing community of mountain bikers and cyclists and the most comprehensive resource for planning your next MTB/cycling adventure. Users can search destinations across the world and choose from thousands of Hosts, Guides, and Destination Tours. We work with locals and tour providers to create a global network of JAGZ users available to be booked in some of the most remote locations. Create a JAGZ account and use our app when you travel or to host those traveling to your town!

What is a Host?

A Host (‘local’) is a mountain biker or cyclist with local knowledge of a particular area that lists their time to be booked by Travelers visiting their town. A Host can create a free personalized profile introducing themselves, set their location and calendar of availability, list their hourly rate, and earn money by receiving bookings. Make money and friends!

What is a Tour Guide?

A Tour Guide is a professionally certified and licensed guide who can create a profile of availability and list tours to be booked by traveling MTBers and cyclists visiting their destination. Guides can create multiple tours and include bike rental options in their listings as well.

What is a Traveler?

A Traveler is an individual looking to book a meeting or tour  with someone who shares his/her interest in mountain biking. Travelers can search for Hosts ('locals'), Guides, and Destination Tours in a selected location and book a meeting ('HOSTtime') with them.

For Travelers

● Book a Tour Guide or Host (local) for your next mountain biking journey
● Search any town for Hosts who share your passion and preferences
● Invite friends or family to accompany you on your adventure
● Message your Host or Guide and establish meet-up plans

Be a Host

● Create and customize a 'Host' profile representing your town
